ch.hszt.connectfour.gui
Interface GameFrame

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainGameFrame
public interface GameFrame

Abstract definition of a frame providing the graphical represenstation of the game.

Version:
1.0, 13.11.2011
Author:
Markus Vetsch

getSlotPanel

SlotPanel getSlotPanel(java.lang.String key)
Returns the SlotPanel for the given key or null, if there was no matching SlotPanel found.

Parameters:
key - - The key of the SlotPanel to be found.
Returns:
The corresponding SlotPanel or null, if there was no matching SlotPanel.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException, - if the key specified is null.

message - - The message to be printed.
